title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Bring holiday cheer home the easy way with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath and Garland Set.

What you get:
- One wreath: about 24 inches across (23.6 inches).
- One garland: about 9 feet long (8.8 feet).
- Soft, warm lights: 100 LED bulbs already attached.

Looks festive and full:
- Snow-dusted pine needles, two kinds of pine cones, bright berry clusters, and frosted branches.
- Warm white lights make a cozy glow without being too bright.

Simple to use:
- No assembly needed. Take it out of the box and hang it up.
- Battery powered: uses 3 AA batteries (not included). No outlet needed.
- Built-in timer: lights turn on for 6 hours, then off for 18 hours, automatically repeating every day.

Safe and dependable:
- Made with sturdy, high-quality materials.
- Hypoallergenic and designed with fireproof pins.
- No watering, no dropping needles, and colors won’t fade.

Where to use it:
- Indoors or outdoors.
- Perfect for doors, walls, fireplaces, windows, living rooms, bedrooms, and dining rooms.

Helpful support:
- 1-year warranty (365 days).
- Friendly customer service available 24 hours a day.

Easy steps:
1) Insert 3 AA batteries.
2) Hang the wreath and the garland where you like.
3) Press the timer button once to set it and forget it.

Enjoy a beautiful, warm holiday look with almost no work—and no mess.
